resources.string: This module contains a known security vulnerability.
This module contains content that should not be publicized or visible everywhere.
The source code is no longer available, no updates possible.
This module depends on other non-free modules.
This module promotes or depends entirely on a non-changeable or non-free network service.
This module tracks and reports your activity.
The upstream source code is not entirely Free.
The module source code may be obfuscated, making it difficult to understand, audit, or modify.
The module removes apps, files, or other modules without user consent.
The module maybe written partially or fully by an LLM
The module is not open source, and its codebase is not accessible to the public for review, modification, or redistribution
